title: Belt, "BELT"
medium:
Medium: rayon, polyester
Technique: Fringed trimming was placed over an elastic belt, air-brushed and then the fringe was stitched to the bottom edge of the belt.
description: Wide black elastic belt with gold buckle and trimming that has been air- brushed in gold to match 1991-87-4.

tombstone.epitaph:
Belt, "BELT".
Medium: rayon, polyester
Technique: Fringed trimming was placed over an elastic belt, air-brushed and then the fringe was stitched to the bottom edge of the belt.. Gift of Marian Clayden. 1991-87-5.
